name: Detect It Picture Puzzle
description:
Challenge yourself in Detect It Picture Puzzle - a famous "find the difference" game. The game helps you improve your hawk eyes with hundreds of levels filled with incredible challenges and brain teasers.
Let sharpen your detective eyes and mind while you find the differences between the two pictures.


HOW TO PLAY:
• Focus and spot the differences in the two pictures shown on the screen.
• Tap and tap to play.
• Train your sharp eyes to find all of them.
• Detect all 5 points to clear the goal.

FEATURES:
• One finger control.
• Thousand individual levels.
• Completely FREE & EASY TO PLAY.
• Let enjoy this game at your own pace!
